data_table.description: Form 83 - Transvaginal Uterine Ultrasound - endometrial thickness; pathology results; endometrial cavity fluid; follow-up results. This form was not required for OS participants, but was included for OS if available.

variable.name: F83VY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: F83DAYS
variable.comment: Days between randomization and initiation of form

variable.name: TVUDY
variable.comment: Days from randomization to transvaginal uterine ultrasound

variable.name: TVUREVDY
variable.description: Days from randomization to TVU report review

variable.name: TVUSUMM
variable.description: Summary of transvaginal uterine ultrasound report

variable.name: PTHPOLYP
variable.comment: Pelvic pathology present: Polyps Sub-question of F83 V2 Q10 'Pelvic pathology present'.

variable.name: PTHUTMAS
variable.comment: Pelvic pathology present: Uterine mass Sub-question of F83 V2 Q10 'Pelvic pathology present'.

variable.name: PTHFLUID
variable.comment: Pelvic pathology present: Pelvic fluid Sub-question of F83 V2 Q10 'Pelvic pathology present'.

variable.name: PTHOVMAS
variable.comment: Pelvic pathology present: Ovarian mass Sub-question of F83 V2 Q10 'Pelvic pathology present'.

variable.name: PTHOTHER
variable.comment: Pelvic pathology present: Other Sub-question of F83 V2 Q10 'Pelvic pathology present'.

variable.name: PTHSIDE
variable.comment:
Pelvic pathology present: Side Sub-question of F83 V2 Q10 'Pelvic pathology present'.
Sub-question of F83 V2 Q10.4 'Ovarian mass' (no skip pattern rule applied).

variable.name: OUTPATH
variable.comment: Other pathology present outside of the reproductive structures?

variable.name: CAVFLUID
variable.comment: Was significant endometrial cavity fluid seen? Not collected on all versions of Form 83.

variable.name: TVUREFER
variable.description: TVU - Referral made for follow-up care
variable.comment: Was a referral made for follow-up care (TVU)?

variable.name: TVUREFDY
variable.description: Days from randomization to TVU referral
variable.comment: Sub-question of F83 V2 Q13 'Referral made'.

variable.name: ENDOFUP
variable.comment: Sub-question of F83 V2 Q13 'Referral made'.

variable.name: PATHFUP
variable.comment: Sub-question of F83 V2 Q13 'Referral made'.
